title: Lightning Bug
summaries: Lightning Bugs are harmless critters that spawn during the night on Hallowed grass blocks. The Lightning Bug has only 5 health and no defense, and can be damaged by other enemies and players.

The Lightning Bug can be caught with any <linked>Bug Net</linked> to be carried around in the <linked>inventory</linked> and released later, or crafted into animated decorative <linked>furniture</linked> (<linked>Lightning Bug in a Bottle</linked>). Once crafted, the Lightning Bug cannot be released again.
The Lightning Bug can be used as <linked>bait</linked> for <linked>fishing</linked>, with 35% bait power.

The Lightning Bug can be spawned by the <linked>Firefly Statue</linked>, however statue-spawned critters cannot be caught with any Bug Net, and will disappear in a puff of smoke when the player attempts to do so.
